Just because someone gives something a low rating, and states whether they believe it's watchable or not, doesn't mean they're bitching... They're helping others decide whether or not to use up their bandwidth by downloading the movie.

I, for one think that when someone writes a comment like: "A-3/V-5, very dark. not very watchable" or "hard to hear" or something like that, it's a lot more helpful than: "Would you people stop bitching?!??! You can't complain when it's free!" etc, etc...
